casebody.data:
State of FLORIDA, plaintiff,
v.
State of GEORGIA. No. 142, Original. Supreme Court of the United States May 18, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of Special Master for allowance of fees and disbursements granted, and the Special Master is awarded a total of $47,635.01 for the period November 19, 2014, through March 31, 2015, to be paid equally by the parties.
